fields.label: Help
fields.options:
Help Text for Base Material Module

Defining Options for Base Materials

Options can be customized and should always include a clear name if specified. This ensures proper identification and categorization of the materials.

Example:

Suppose you have a Base Material called Paperboard, which includes 7 distinct types. Each type should be given a specific name.

  • Base Material Name: Represents the primary material (e.g., Paperboard).
  • Option Name 1: Represents the category or characteristic being specified (e.g., Paperboard Type).
  • Options 1 Field: Lists the distinct names for each type. Each name should be entered on a separate line.

Example Configuration

Option Name 1: Paperboard Type

Options 1:

  • Uncoated Kraft Multi-layer
  • White Back Multi-layer
  • Kraft Back Multi-layer
  • Recycled Grey Back
  • Recycled Kraft Back
  • Uncoated Solid Kraft
  • White Back Solid
  • Kraft Back Solid

By structuring the options in this way, you ensure clarity, consistency, and ease of use when working with Base Materials in the module.
